price: 12.Diggah anu ku-Rabbi kinniyok isi namına kebella siib, diggah atu tuwa deqsita daqaray saytunnoowel tanik kaak iyye.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
